actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Beak attack and one Talon attack.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 8 (1d10+3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Talon
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 7 (1d8+3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Wing Slap (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Slams its sharp-edged wings together in front of itself in a 15 ft. cone. All in area make a DC 13 Dex save. On a failure a creature takes 10 (3d6) slashing damage and is pushed up to 10 ft. away from the wakwak and knocked prone. On a success a creature takes half the damage and isn't pushed or knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Bloodthirsty Pounce
special_abilities.desc: If the wakwak moves at least 20' straight toward a creature and then hits it with Talon attack on the same turn that target must make DC 13 Str save or be knocked prone. If the target is prone the wakwak can make one Beak attack vs. it as a bonus action gaining temp hp equal to half the damage dealt.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on attacks vs. creature if 1+ unincapacitated attacker ally is within 5 ft. of target.
